thread.title: Man United news: Jose Mourinho names surprise man of the match vs Blackburn | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United news: Jose Mourinho names surprise man of the match vs Blackburn | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United news: Jose Mourinho names surprise man of the match vs Blackburn | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 5:54 pm Jose Mourinho hailed Ashley Young as Manchester United’s man of the match. (AMA/Getty Images) 
Jose Mourinho has named Ashley Young as Manchester United’s man of the match in their FA Cup victory over Blackburn Rovers. 
United fell behind following Danny Graham’s opener but equalised after Marcus Rashford met Henrikh Mkhitaryan’s sublime through ball and won the game through Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s strike 15 minutes from time. 
Young was starting only his sixth game of the season in all competitions but Mourinho believes the 31-year-old delivered an ‘amazing performance’. 
‘Our boys were really good, it is impossible to do better than what we did,’ the United manager told MUTV. Young delivered an ‘amazing performance’, claims Mourinho. (AMA/Getty Images)
